    • getPreferredName

      public List<ILangStringPreferredNameTypeIec61360> getPreferredName()
      Description copied from interface: IDataSpecificationIec61360
      Preferred name

      It is advised to keep the length of the name limited to 35 characters.

      Constraints:

      • Constraint AASc-3a-002: IDataSpecificationIec61360.getPreferredName() shall be provided at least in English.
      Specified by:
      getPreferredName in interface IDataSpecificationIec61360

    • getUnitId

      public Optional<IReference> getUnitId()
      Description copied from interface: IDataSpecificationIec61360
      Unique unit id

      IDataSpecificationIec61360.getUnit() and IDataSpecificationIec61360.getUnitId() need to be consistent if both attributes are set

      It is recommended to use an external reference ID.

      Specified by:
      getUnitId in interface IDataSpecificationIec61360
